column4: anyone here have ati drivers working with cedega ?... 8.28.8 fails 3d acceleration
Any ATI Radeon users in here ??
Who here wants to be stumped with an ati problem :P
honestly....if you use sparc i would use a kernel from kernel.org ...
what would the advantaged be of using a kernel from kernel.org?
you get to tell it what to use and which modules to setup
that one is really hard to get working, i spend hours on that card before
former gentoo user, i know how to compile a kernel
lemme do a quick google and see if anything sparcs the solution of how i solved it
I do remember getting it working
did you use the driver and instructions off of ATI's website?
do you have /dev/shm support in your kernel?
I know it's a gentoo page but i think that is why my ati drivers weren't working, incorrect kernel config
on that same page there is also some info concerning config files for x and so on, might be worth it to check that out too
